senses.sense_definition: To remove hard mineral deposits from the surface of metal or the inside of appliances like kettles and boilers.

examples.text: You should <w>descale</w> your coffee machine every few months to keep it working efficiently.
The plumber used a strong chemical to <w>descale</w> the old heating pipes.

senses.sense_definition: To remove the small, hard plates from the skin of a fish.

examples.text: The chef showed the apprentice how to <w>descale</w> a fish without tearing the skin.
It is much easier to <w>descale</w> the catch if you have the right tool.
